# Ruud Hendrikx

> Data Scientist & Tech Lead based in Amsterdam area, Netherlands.

Results-driven problem solver with a strong curiosity and an entrepreneurial growth mindset. Background in experimental physics, trained in applying first principles thinking to complex problems. Bridges deep technical expertise with strategic insight to drive high-impact machine learning solutions.
